marklogic.body: I'm not complaining, but what's the real value of these picks? The Steelers won't have a ton of roster Spots up for grabs, right? It seems like it's almost like the chance to draft some guys who they otherwise would have pursued as UDFAs, which is a nice luxury. And there are Always those USFAs who stick... like Saunders, Clay, Legursky, Foster, etc. I guess you draft some "upside" guys who can hope to make the practice squad to develop. I guess you're happy if 1 or 2 pan out.
